verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that, while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> was at <S%G1722><s%> Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> having passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> the upper <S%G510><s%> coasts <S%G3313><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Ephesus: <S%G2181><s%> and finding <S%G2147><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

He said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Have <S%G2076><s%> you received <S%G2983><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> since you believed? <S%G4100><s%> And they said <S%G2036><s%> to him, We have <S%G2076><s%> not so <S%G3761><s%> much <S%G3761><s%> as heard <S%G191><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> there be any Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, To what <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> were you baptized? <S%G907><s%> And they said, <S%G2036><s%> To John's <S%G2491><s%> baptism. <S%G908><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance, <S%G3341><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to the people, <S%G2992><s%> that they should believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him which should come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> him, that is, on <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
When they heard <S%G191><s%> this, they were baptized <S%G907><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And when Paul <S%G3972><s%> had laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on them, the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them; and they spoke <S%G2980><s%> with tongues, <S%G1100><s%> and prophesied. <S%G4395><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> the men <S%G435><s%> were about <S%G5616><s%> twelve. <S%G1177><s%>

And he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> and spoke <S%G2980><s%> boldly <S%G3955><s%> for the space <S%G1909><s%> of three <S%G5140><s%> months, <S%G3376><s%> disputing <S%G1256><s%> and persuading <S%G3982><s%> the things concerning <S%G4012><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But when <S%G5613><s%> divers <S%G5100><s%> were hardened, <S%G4645><s%> and believed <S%G544><s%> not, but spoke <S%G2551><s%> evil of that way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the multitude, <S%G4128><s%> he departed <S%G868><s%> from them, and separated <S%G873><s%> the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> disputing <S%G1256><s%> daily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> in the school <S%G4981><s%> of one <S%G5100><s%> Tyrannus. <S%G5181><s%>

And this <S%G5124><s%> continued <S%G1096><s%> by the space <S%G1909><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> years; <S%G2094><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> they which dwelled <S%G2730><s%> in Asia <S%G773><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> and Greeks. <S%G1672><s%>
And God <S%G2316><s%> worked <S%G4160><s%> special <S%G3756><s%> miracles <S%G1411><s%> by the hands <S%G5495><s%> of Paul: <S%G3972><s%>

So <S%G5620><s%> that from his body <S%G5559><s%> were brought <S%G2018><s%> to the sick <S%G770><s%> handkerchiefs <S%G4676><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> aprons, <S%G4612><s%> and the diseases <S%G3554><s%> departed <S%G525><s%> from them, and the evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out of them.

Then <S%G1161><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the vagabond <S%G4022><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> exorcists, <S%G1845><s%> took <S%G2021><s%> on them to call <S%G3687><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them which had <S%G2192><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the LORD <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> We adjure <S%G3726><s%> you by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> preaches. <S%G2784><s%>
And there were seven <S%G2033><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of one Sceva, <S%G4630><s%> a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> and chief <S%G749><s%> of the priests, <S%G749><s%> which did <S%G4160><s%> so. <S%G5124><s%>

And the evil <S%G4190><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> I know, <S%G1097><s%> and Paul <S%G3972><s%> I know; <S%G1987><s%> but who <S%G5101><s%> are you?

And the man <S%G444><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> the evil <S%G4190><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> was leaped <S%G2177><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, and overcame <S%G2634><s%> them, and prevailed <S%G2480><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> them, so <S%G5620><s%> that they fled <S%G1628><s%> out of that house <S%G3624><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%> and wounded. <S%G5135><s%>

And this <S%G5124><s%> was known <S%G1110><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> and Greeks <S%G1672><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> dwelling <S%G2730><s%> at Ephesus; <S%G2181><s%> and fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them all, <S%G3956><s%> and the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was magnified. <S%G3170><s%>
And many <S%G4183><s%> that believed <S%G4100><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and confessed, <S%G1843><s%> and showed <S%G312><s%> their deeds. <S%G4234><s%>

Many <S%G2425><s%> of them also <S%G1161><s%> which used <S%G4238><s%> curious <S%G4021><s%> arts <S%G4021><s%> brought <S%G4851><s%> their books <S%G976><s%> together, <S%G4851><s%> and burned <S%G2618><s%> them before <S%G1799><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men: and they counted <S%G4860><s%> the price <S%G5092><s%> of them, and found <S%G2147><s%> it fifty <S%G4002><s%> <S%G3461><s%> thousand <S%G3461><s%> pieces of silver. <S%G694><s%>
So <S%G3779><s%> mightily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2904><s%> grew <S%G837><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2962><s%> and prevailed. <S%G2480><s%>

After <S%G5613><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things were ended, <S%G4137><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> purposed <S%G5087><s%> in the spirit, <S%G4151><s%> when he had passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> and Achaia, <S%G882><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> saying, <S%G2036><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> I have been <S%G1096><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> I must <S%G1163><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> Rome. <S%G4516><s%>

So he sent <S%G649><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of them that ministered <S%G1247><s%> to him, Timotheus <S%G5095><s%> and Erastus; <S%G2037><s%> but he himself <S%G846><s%> stayed <S%G1907><s%> in Asia <S%G773><s%> for a season. <S%G5550><s%>
And the same <S%G1565><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> small <S%G3641><s%> stir <S%G5017><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> that way. <S%G3598><s%>

For a certain <S%G5100><s%> man named <S%G3686><s%> Demetrius, <S%G1216><s%> a silversmith, <S%G695><s%> which made <S%G4160><s%> silver <S%G693><s%> shrines <S%G3485><s%> for Diana, <S%G735><s%> brought <S%G3930><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> small <S%G3641><s%> gain <S%G2039><s%> to the craftsmen; <S%G5079><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> he called <S%G4867><s%> together <S%G4867><s%> with the workmen <S%G2040><s%> of like <S%G5108><s%> occupation, <S%G5078><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Sirs, <S%G435><s%> you know <S%G1987><s%> that by this <S%G5026><s%> craft <S%G2039><s%> we have <S%G2076><s%> our wealth. <S%G2142><s%>

Moreover <S%G2532><s%> you see <S%G2334><s%> and hear, <S%G191><s%> that not alone <S%G3440><s%> at Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> but almost <S%G4975><s%> throughout all <S%G3956><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> has persuaded <S%G3982><s%> and turned <S%G3179><s%> away <S%G3179><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people, <S%G3793><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> that they be no <S%G3756><s%> gods, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are made <S%G1096><s%> with hands: <S%G5495><s%>

So that not only <S%G3440><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> our craft <S%G3313><s%> is in danger <S%G2793><s%> to be set <S%G2064><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> nothing; <S%G557><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> that the temple <S%G2411><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> goddess <S%G2299><s%> Diana <S%G735><s%> should be despised, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3049><s%> and her magnificence <S%G3168><s%> should <S%G3195><s%> be destroyed, <S%G2507><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> and the world <S%G3625><s%> worships. <S%G4576><s%>

And when they heard <S%G191><s%> these sayings, they were full <S%G4134><s%> of wrath, <S%G2372><s%> and cried <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> is Diana <S%G735><s%> of the Ephesians. <S%G2180><s%>

And the whole <S%G3650><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> was filled <S%G4130><s%> with confusion: <S%G4799><s%> and having caught <S%G4884><s%> Gaius <S%G1050><s%> and Aristarchus, <S%G708><s%> men of Macedonia, <S%G3110><s%> Paul's <S%G3972><s%> companions <S%G4898><s%> in travel, <S%G4898><s%> they rushed <S%G3729><s%> with one <S%G3661><s%> accord <S%G3661><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the theatre. <S%G2302><s%>
And when Paul <S%G3972><s%> would have <S%G1014><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> in to the people, <S%G1218><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> suffered <S%G1439><s%> him not.

And certain <S%G5100><s%> of the chief <S%G775><s%> of Asia, <S%G775><s%> which were his friends, <S%G5384><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> to him, desiring <S%G3870><s%> him that he would not adventure <S%G1325><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the theatre. <S%G2302><s%>

Some <S%G243><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> one <S%G3303><s%> thing, and some <S%G243><s%> another: <S%G243><s%> for the assembly <S%G1577><s%> was confused: <S%G4797><s%> and the more <S%G4119><s%> part knew <S%G1492><s%> not why <S%G5101><s%> <S%G1752><s%> they were come <S%G4905><s%> together. <S%G4897><s%>

And they drew <S%G4264><s%> Alexander <S%G223><s%> out of the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> putting <S%G4261><s%> him forward. <S%G4261><s%> And Alexander <S%G223><s%> beckoned <S%G2678><s%> with the hand, <S%G5495><s%> and would <S%G2309><s%> have made <S%G626><s%> his defense <S%G626><s%> to the people. <S%G1218><s%>

But when they knew <S%G1921><s%> that he was a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> with one <S%G3391><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> the space <S%G1909><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> hours <S%G5610><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> out, Great <S%G3173><s%> is Diana <S%G735><s%> of the Ephesians. <S%G2180><s%>

And when the town clerk <S%G1122><s%> had appeased <S%G2687><s%> the people, <S%G3793><s%> he said, <S%G5346><s%> You men <S%G435><s%> of Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is there that knows <S%G1097><s%> not how that the city <S%G4172><s%> of the Ephesians <S%G2180><s%> is a worshipper <S%G3511><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> goddess <S%G2299><s%> Diana, <S%G735><s%> and of the image which fell <S%G1356><s%> down from Jupiter? <S%G1356><s%>

Seeing then <S%G3767><s%> that these <S%G5130><s%> things cannot <S%G368><s%> be spoken <S%G369><s%> against, <S%G368><s%> you ought <S%G1163><s%> to be quiet, <S%G2687><s%> and to do <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> rashly. <S%G4312><s%>

For you have brought <S%G71><s%> here these <S%G5128><s%> men, <S%G435><s%> which are neither <S%G3777><s%> robbers <S%G2417><s%> of churches, <S%G2417><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> yet blasphemers <S%G987><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> goddess. <S%G2299><s%>

Why <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Demetrius, <S%G1216><s%> and the craftsmen <S%G5079><s%> which are with him, have <S%G2192><s%> a matter <S%G3056><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man, the law <S%G60><s%> is open, <S%G71><s%> and there are deputies: <S%G446><s%> let them accuse <S%G1458><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> you inquire <S%G1934><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing concerning <S%G4012><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> matters, it shall be determined <S%G1956><s%> in a lawful <S%G1772><s%> assembly. <S%G1577><s%>

For we are in danger <S%G2793><s%> to be called <S%G1458><s%> in question <S%G1458><s%> for this <S%G4594><s%> day's <S%G4594><s%> uproar, <S%G4714><s%> there being <S%G5225><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> cause <S%G158><s%> whereby <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3757><s%> we may <S%G1410><s%> give <S%G591><s%> an account <S%G3056><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> concourse. <S%G4963><s%>
And when he had thus <S%G5023><s%> spoken, <S%G2036><s%> he dismissed <S%G630><s%> the assembly. <S%G1577><s%>
